name: Power Management
description: Sector template for power management patents including power supply, charging, DC-DC conversion, and power distribution.
contextDescription: Power management patents cover power supply, distribution, and efficiency in electronic systems. Key areas include DC-DC converters, battery charging (H02J7/*), power distribution (H02J1/*), and power protection. High-value targets include mobile device chargers (Apple, Samsung, Qualcomm QC, USB-PD), laptop power systems, and data center power infrastructure.
scoringGuidance: Fast charging patents (QC, USB-PD) are widely licensed and litigated.
DC-DC converter patents apply to all battery-powered devices.
Power efficiency patents have growing importance due to sustainability regulations.
Data center power patents target cloud infrastructure.
Wireless charging patents are increasingly important in mobile and automotive.

questions.question: Does this patent relate to battery charging technology (fast charge, wireless, USB-PD)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Fast charging is a competitive differentiator. Assess charging technology.

questions.question: How applicable is this to mobile device power management (smartphones, tablets, laptops)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Mobile power is constrained and critical. Assess mobile applicability.

questions.question: Does this patent improve power conversion efficiency or reduce power losses?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Efficiency is universally important. Quantify efficiency improvements if possible.
